text: Melissa Conyears-Ervin is an American politician and the current Chicago City Treasurer.https://wbbm780.radio.com/articles/state-rep-melissa-conyears-ervin- beats-ald-ameya-pawar-cook-county-treasurer She was previously a Democratic member of the Illinois House of Representatives, representing the 10th District since 2017. The 10th district includes all or parts of West Garfield Park, East Garfield Park, United Center, Ukrainian Village, River West, Goose Island, Wicker Park and Lincoln Park in Chicago. ==Electoral history== ===Illinois State House=== ===Chicago City Treasurer=== {| class="wikitable collapsible sortable" !colspan=7 textalign=center|2019 Chicago City Treasurer election |- ! rowspan=2|Candidate ! colspan=2|First round ! colspan=2|Runoff |- ! Vote ! % ! Vote ! % |- | Melissa Conyears-Ervin |225,385 |44.26% |296,293 |59.38% |- | Ameya Pawar | 211,759 | 41.59% |202,714 |40.62% |- |Peter Gariepy |72,068 |14.15% | | |- |Write-in |4 |0.00% | | |} ==References== ==External links== * City Treasurer of Chicago's Office Category:21st-century American politicians Category:21st-century American women politicians Category:Chicago- Kent College of Law alumni Category:City Treasurers of Chicago Category:Illinois Democrats Category:Illinois lawyers Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:Living people Category:Members of the Illinois House of Representatives Category:University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign alumni Category:Women state legislators in Illinois Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Melissa Conyears
